rows.label: qev040601_MSG0001
rows.name:
Terrible news! Brotherpon of Moimoi has sent up
distress signal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0002
rows.name:
Muimui say that strange monster chasing him all
around Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0003
rows.name: Now friend must go rescue him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0004
rows.name:
Or else instead of finding Sword of Legendaryness
and feasting like king, Muimui will BECOME feast![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0006
rows.name: Thank you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0007
rows.name:
With Infinigoggles Moimoi made, brotherpon should
be able to spot even critters hiding in shadows.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0008
rows.name:
And Muimui is king of running away from everything,
so nasty critters won't catch him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0009
rows.name:
Moimoi think Nopon must just look super tasty to
everyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev000406_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev000406_SEL0011
rows.name: Drool a bit and say that yes, Moimoi looks delicious.

rows.label: qev000406_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev000406_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you don't especially want to eat Nopon.

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0010
rows.name: Eep! Moimoi feel predatory gaze from somewhere![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0011
rows.name:
Brotherpon must be in even MORE danger out there in
Primordia![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0012
rows.name:
Even brotherpon may not be able to run forever.
Friend must help him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0013
rows.name:
Whew! Lately, Moimoi asked what flavor he is by all
sorts of xenoforms. It starting to get on nerves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0014
rows.name:
Moimoi just hope critters of Primordia agree with
friend. Maybe then they give up on eating brotherpon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0015
rows.name:
Still, better to hurry out there and help him.
Moimoi leave life of brotherpon in hands of friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0016
rows.name: Muimui is running for life all across Primordia![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0017
rows.name:
Friend has to go save him before he becomes lunch of
nasty critter![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0018
rows.name: Cheer up, Brotherpon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0019
rows.name: So much debt... At this rate, Muimui starve in streets![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0020
rows.name:
Sorry... Muimui wanted to be more dependable
brotherpon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0021
rows.name:
Oh, hush. Moimoi is sure Brotherpon will find
Sword of Legendaryness next time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0022
rows.name:
...Hmm? Oh, friend came back to check on us?
Thanks again for helping brotherpon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev000406_JNK0030
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev000406_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask to hear more about the sword.

rows.label: qev000406_JNK0040
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev000406_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Muimui why he's so glum.

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0023
rows.name:
It is technically legendary item, so Legen-dar picked it
up, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0024
rows.name:
turns out it is actually sword that littlepon of legendary
heropon used to play with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0025
rows.name:
Brotherpon discovered Sword of Legendaryness,
so he spent the whole trip back to New LA dreaming
of what to spend sales money on. But...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0026
rows.name:
turns out it is actually sword that littlepon of legendary
heropon used to play with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0027
rows.name: And legendary toy sword only worth about 250 credits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0028
rows.name:
According to old writings, real Sword of Legendaryness
has strange pattern that appears on handguard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0029
rows.name: Moimoi should have told brotherpon about that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0030
rows.name:
Risked life! Defeated monsters! Finally found sword!
And for what? *sigh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev000406_JNK0050
rows.name: Correct

rows.label: qev000406_SEL0051
rows.name: Point out that it was you who defeated the indigens.

rows.label: qev000406_JNK0060
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev000406_SEL0061
rows.name: Cheer up the despondent Muimui.

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0031
rows.name:
...Friend is sure? Hmm. Memory of Muimui a little
fuzzy on the subject.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0032
rows.name:
This one not so easy to bounce back from.
It was greatest adventure in life of Muimui.
*sigh* Oh well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0033
rows.name: Thank you, friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0034
rows.name:
Quest of brotherpon to find Sword of Legendaryness
will go on! ...Probably. Some day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040601_MSG0035
rows.name:
Moimoi hopes friend will offer the same support for
him when that happens.[ST:wait ]
